item.title: Optimizing Microsoft 365 licensing, part 1
item.description: It’s that time of the year. You have one month before the yearly license numbers are due to be delivered to Microsoft. The questions have started pouring in. Can we make any savings? Are we utilizing all the features we have purchased? Do we have enough licenses for all our workloads? Are we even compliant? You have already dedicated your time to other projects, and now this needs to be handled in the middle of all this.
